Data: Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run driven down to mid-off from off stump. Good stride forward from Khawaja
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja leans back and chops this back of a length ball on off to third man
Brathwaite to Smith, FOUR runs full and outside off, Smith throws his hands at a drive. No feet movement. Toe-ends the slash through vacant first slip
Brathwaite to Smith, no run full and angled in on off, Smith tips forward and covers up well
Brathwaite to Smith, no run back of a length and just a shade outside off, Smith steps forward and bunts it gently to the cover region
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run short and angled in, not short enough to pose a threat. The batsman gets on top of the bounce and punches an easy single to long-on
Narine to Smith, no run tossed on off and dips, Smith bends forward to defend
Narine to Smith, no run shorter offbreak, pushed to left of KP at short midwicket
Narine to Smith, no run another offbreak, perfectly pitched around off, drifts in and catches the top of the pad
Narine to Smith, no run Narine sends down another offbreak, Smith reads the spin now, clipping it gently to square leg
Narine to Smith, 1 run Smith shuffles across and whips this length ball from off stump to midwicket
Narine to Khawaja, FOUR runs full on off, full enough for the sweep, even as Khawaja took his eyes off the paddle. Played fine to the right of Ramdin. Brathwaite chases in vain. The result is a four
Brathwaite to Smith, no run another communication breakdown. Full and angled in, leading-edged to mid-off. Smith sets off and is near the middle of the pitch. The opener sends him back
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run eased to sweeper cover for a comfortable single
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run full and veering into the pads, clipped out to square leg
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run short and angled in on top of off, no room. Chopped down towards third man
Brathwaite to Smith, no run Smith uses his feet, Carlos pulls his length back on off.Quietly patted to the leg side
Brathwaite to Smith, no run fullish and on off stump, pushed back to the bowler. Tidy over
Taylor to Khawaja, FOUR runs short and wide outside off from round the wicket, the cut flew to the right of Fletcher at backward point. He skipped back and smeared it to the boundary
Taylor to Khawaja, 1 run short and angled in, this is picked away to deep square leg
Taylor to Smith, 1 run keeps it short and outside off, Smith rises on top of the bounce, punching serenely to deep cover
Taylor to Khawaja, 1 run dug in outside off, Khawaja jumps back and controls a pull to deep midwicket
Taylor to Smith, no run full and angled in, pushed down to mid-on
Taylor to Smith, FOUR runs off-stump full toss, happily whipped to the midwicket boundary. Taylor hasn't been consistent with his lengths today
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run full and angled in on off, clipped to midwicket
Brathwaite to Khawaja, SIX runs length ball on off, right in Khawaja's hitting range. No swing. He launches it over long-on for the first six of the match
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run KP dives full-length to his left from short extra cover and stops this drive from Khawaja. Sprawling save
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run Short and angled in, Khawaja uses his wrists and guides it towards long leg
Brathwaite to Smith, FOUR runs Smith presses across off, this is short on leg, loose stuff. Smith pulls, having got inside the line, nay just helps it on its way for four
Brathwaite to Smith, no run indipper on off, Smith defends and gets an inside edge that rolls on the pitch
Taylor to Khawaja, 1 run back of a length and outside off, from round the wicket, slapped to cover-point region
Taylor to Smith, 1 run full and straight, Smith had shuffled across, picking it away to deep midwicket
Taylor to Khawaja, 1 run full and straight outside off, carved out to deep point
Taylor to Smith, no run back of a length, angles it into the right hander. Head over the ball, defended back to Taylor
Taylor to Smith, no run full and hurled at off stump, tapped back to Taylor on the front foot
Taylor to Smith, no run full and curls in on off, Smith falls over slightly on the drive. He ends up wafting it towards the covers
Benn to Khawaja, no run some flight to start on off, Khawaja comes forward and offers a dead bat to defend
Benn to Khawaja, 1 run shorter on off and middle, clipped towards short fine leg. Some hesitation but a misfield allows the run
Benn to Smith, no run too much flight, too full, too easily defended
Benn to Smith, 1 run drags the length shorter on leg, allows Smith to go back and nudge towards square leg
Benn to Khawaja, 1 run a tad too full again and driven to long-on
Benn to Smith, 1 run superbly played. Just opens the face and guides the bat towards extra cover to get one. Exemplary use of the wrists on slow surfaces, although this isn't exactly slow
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run starts with a full straight delivery and tucked towards midwicket
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run full and wide outside off, driven to cover. Off the toe-end, not timing at all
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run properly timed off drive but he finds mid-off does Usman K. Maybe a tad too full on this surface
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run wrong shot choice. Shortish and wide outside off, Khawaja picked the length early and tries to pull but inside-edged onto his body for a run
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run better length. Shortish on off, punched to long-on from the crease. Nicely played
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run another fluent drive to mid-off but no run because the fielder is quick on it. Just getting a bit frustrated with his failure to find gaps in the last few overs
Benn to Smith, no run shortish and wide outside off, Smith goes back to punch to extra cover
Benn to Smith, no run good line, fuller but straight and Smith defends
Benn to Smith, no run shortish but straighter and Smith chops a cut to short third man. Some more miscommunication but no damage done
Benn to Smith, no run leg side-ish and clipped to midwicket
Benn to Smith, no run flat and straight, hit to midwicket off the back foot
Benn to Smith, 1 run prevents the maiden with a crisp drive to deep cover off the full delivery. Good batting, didn't get exasperated with the dot balls
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run worked off the straight line to deep square leg for a single
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run full and wide, scythed to deep point for the run to get his second his successive fifty. Good innings but a long way still to go
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run shortish length outside off, Smith eases back and then punches to long-on to get one
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run on-driven straight to the bowler, thereby sending Smith scurrying back into his crease
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 2 runs tucked easily off the hips to backward square leg and a fumble allows the second. Better from UK
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run squeezed off the outside edge to third man for one. Nice line, just outside that off stump
Benn to Khawaja, 1 run overpitched outside off, squirted to deep point
Benn to Smith, 1 run nice use of the feet, gets to the pitch of the flighted delivery and drills a drive to long-on
Benn to Khawaja, no run tossed up outside off, mis-timed to cover again.
Benn to Khawaja, no run turned, off the straight line, to midwicket
Benn to Khawaja, 1 run flicks this to deep midwicket, picked the length on that shortish delivery early
Benn to Smith, no run nice end. Another tight over. Flight outside off, pushed to point
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run honing in on that off bail, steered to short third man for one
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run a short pitched delivery outside off, Smith rocks back, rolls his wrists on the ball to pull to deep square leg
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run another nice glide off the open face to third man
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run punched from the crease to long-on. Smith finding the gaps nicely
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run short and wide, laced to deep point
Brathwaite to Smith, no run back of a length on off, tight and nagging, defended back. Good over again
Benn to Khawaja, no run massive turn and rip into Khawaja, swerves back in to hit Khawaja on the pad in front of off. Maybe too high, a muted appeal
Benn to Khawaja, no run flicked away, with the turn, to midwicket
Benn to Khawaja, no run more flight and turn, well bowled. Outside off, Khawaja presses forward to defend
Benn to Khawaja, 1 run runs to the pitch to flick to deep midwicket this time
Benn to Smith, 1 run overpitched on middle, driven to long-on nicely
Benn to Khawaja, no run yorker on middle to finish. Jammed out to midwicket to end yet another tidy over
Narine to Smith, no run tossed up on off, the offbreak, flicked to midwicket
Narine to Smith, no run more turn on off, Smith defends from the front foot
Narine to Smith, no run uses his feet, runs to the pitch and then clips but finds midwicket. Good tight bowling
Narine to Smith, no run slightly shortish on off, and so Smith hangs back but nurdles to midwicket for another run
Narine to Smith, 1 run comes down again, flicks past short leg for a run. Relatively safe
Narine to Khawaja, no run nice end. Just one of the over. The offbreak on off is defended towards point

Benn to Smith, SIX runs superb shot. Exemplary use of the feet, gets to the pitch, and then uses plenty of power in his wrists to flick over long-on. got so much power on that, and it clears the boundary easily
Benn to Smith, no run flat on middle and leg, defended
Benn to Smith, no run slightly shorter outside off, punched to cover
Benn to Smith, no run flatter on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
Benn to Smith, no run tossed up, Smith comes to the pitch, drives back. Benn picks up, throws the stumps down as Smith makes his crease with a dive
Benn to Smith, SIX runs six more. Slightly short, Smith picks the length early, rocks back and then muscles a pull over midwicket for six. Really good shot, made use of the lengths on both occasions
Narine to Khawaja, SIX runs Khawaja this time. Runs flowing suddenly. Flight on off, Khawaja gets on one knee and then wallops the slog sweep over midwicket for a massive six
Narine to Khawaja, no run the exact same delivery. Flight on off, but Khawaja strides forward to defend this time
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run shortish and wide, slapped to deep cover
Narine to Smith, 1 run flight outside off, wristily flicked to long-on for a run
Narine to Khawaja, no run shortish, but comes back in. The carrom ball. Cut to point
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run slower and straighter, Khawaja rocks back and tucks this to midwicket to get one
Benn to Khawaja, FOUR runs steps out, gets to the pitch of the flight, and then drills a drive over the bowler's head. Even Pollard cannot get to it, great place to hit the ball
Benn to Khawaja, no run slower but dragged the length back after seeing Khawaja coming. Padded up, back up the pitch
Benn to Khawaja, no run the flat slider on off, Khawaja goes back to defend
Benn to Khawaja, SIX runs six more. Runs flowing here. Great use of the feet again, got to the pitch and hit the ball over mid-off, against the spin. Aided by smothering the spin
Benn to Khawaja, no run flight on off, blocked
Benn to Khawaja, 5 wide what happened there? Flat down leg, Khawaja goes back to pull but misses. Ramdin fails to get any glove on it, five free runs
Benn to Khawaja, no run flat on off to finish, defended
Narine to Smith, 1 run flight on off, more use of the feet to drive to long-on. Really good batting
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run short on off, Khawaja rocks back and swivel-pulls to deep midwicket. On the bounce to the fielder
Narine to Smith, no run flight outside off, defended
Narine to Smith, no run lots of flight on off, clipped to short mid-on. That fielder is forcing Smith to play with an angled bat
Narine to Smith, 1 run runs down and then whips the ball to deep midwicket
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run hit, into the off side, towards sweeper cover
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run strays down leg immediately and clipped to fine leg
Holder to Smith, 1 run good length on off, turned to square leg to get one
Holder to Khawaja, no run back of a length on off, Khawaja advances but clips to midwicket
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run short and wide outside off, slapped to the sweeper cover from the crease. Nice shot
Holder to Smith, 2 runs full toss outside off, driven to deep cover for a couple. Holder is on two lengths it seems
Holder to Smith, 1 run an offcutter outside off to finish, Smith steers to third man with absolutely no movement of the feet
Pollard to Smith, 2 runs slower delivery to start, shocker. Clipped to fine leg.
Pollard to Smith, 1 run another cutter on off, sooooo much time for Smith to just whip to square leg.
Pollard to Khawaja, 2 runs yet another slower delivery outside off but Khawaja is aware of the field and cuts between short third man and point for a couple
Pollard to Khawaja, no run the fourth cutter in a row. Outside off and cut to point, so slow again. Providing no pace
Pollard to Khawaja, 1 wide wow, wide on the adjacent pitch as well. A full toss outside off goes wrong
Pollard to Khawaja, 1 run another slower ball on off, full this time and a languid drive to long-off
Pollard to Smith, 1 run the seventh slower ball of the over. Outside off and punched to long-on
Holder to Smith, 1 run fullish and wide, smeared into the off side for one
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run shortish length outside off, Khawaja rolls his wrists on it and keeps it down, smashes to deep midwicket
Holder to Smith, no run overpitched outside off, drilled to cover
Holder to Smith, no run slower delivery outside off, Smith drag-flicks to square leg
Holder to Smith, 1 run naughty full toss down leg, holder gets away with it as Smith whips to fine leg, gets just one for it
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run slower delivery outside off, glided off the open face to third man for one
Pollard to Khawaja, no run slower cutter outside off, Khawaja fails to get bat on his attempted steer
Pollard to Khawaja, no run another cutter outside off, extracts a bit of bounce, pushed to cover
Pollard to Khawaja, no run steps out this time but Pollard bowls a wider cutter. Khawaja finds cover again. A bit of frustration building
Pollard to Khawaja, no run slower and wide again, Khawaja badly mis-times a cut to cover. Four dot balls
Pollard to Khawaja, 1 run drills a square drive off the fifth ball to prevent the maiden
Pollard to Smith, 1 run slower and wide, scythed to short third man. No run. Good over
Holder to Smith, 1 run fullish on off, Smith comes down and drills a drive to mid-off. Times that beautifully but fails to find the gap
Holder to Khawaja, no run whoa, a lot of bounce on that as Khawaja fails to connect with an attempted pull outside off
Holder to Khawaja, no run dabs one to point.Smith comes down for one but is sent back late, a direct hit would have had Smith
Holder to Khawaja, 1 run he gets one this time. A short delivery on off, Khawaja comes down and toe-ends this past the bowler for a run
Holder to Smith, 1 run a slower delivery on off, Smith goes back and tries to pull but the ball holds up in the pitch and he fails to make contact. Off the toe end for a run
Holder to Khawaja, no run whew, that offcutter has jagged and moves away prodigiously. Beats Khawaja's bat by a distance. Ripper, opened him up completely
Pollard to Smith, 1 run would have been out with a direct hit again. Full down leg, pulled to short fine leg where Benn fields well and fires a throw to the batsman's end but misses
Pollard to Khawaja, 1 run cut to deep point
Pollard to Smith, 1 run another cutter on off and middle, Smith looks to flick but gets a thick inside edge into his pad
Pollard to Khawaja, no run short and wide outside off, and very slow. Toe-ended to midwicket.
Pollard to Khawaja, 1 run shortish and wide again, mis-timed to long-off. Just one this time
Pollard to Smith, 1 run a slower delivery on the pads, worked away to square leg for one.

Brathwaite to Smith, OUT taken! Smith goes. Superb bowling previously has led to a wicket for Brathwaite. A legcutter this time, quite full and wide outside off. Smith looks to execute an ugly drag-sweep into the leg side but the ball is top-edged and goes straight in the air. Hangs there for quite awhile, Brathwaite calls, settles himself under it and takes a go
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run very full at off, Bailey strides forward and push-drives it to mid-off
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run little offcutter on off, 109ks, Bailey waits and defends it to the off side
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run short and wide outside off, Bailey misses out, cutting straight to backward point
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run fuller and outside off, Bailey is forward as he jabs to backward point

Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run back of a length and outside off, does not quite come onto the new batsman. He shapes to cut and ends up chopping to the right of Ramdin. Oh, Ramdin took his right glove off and crashed awkwardly on his right shoulder while looking to throw. He fails to effect a direct hit, Khawaja is home
Narine to Bailey, no run offbreak, drifts down leg, Bailey prods and misses. And Fletcher stops it between the legs. Ah, not a wide!
Narine to Bailey, no run pushed back to the bowler as this was full on the stumps
Narine to Bailey, 1 run dragged down short and outside off, chopped to the covers on the back foot. Holder makes a diving save to his left at short extra cover
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run dropped short on off, Khawaja swivel-pulls to deep midwicket. One slip in, btw
Narine to Bailey, no run offbreak, drifts in and catches the pad as Bailey wafts and misses. It was nipping down leg
Narine to Bailey, 1 run reverts to the short length, swatted from off stump to deep midwicket
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run loopy cutter on off, dabbed back on the front foot
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run back of a length and outside off, jabbed out to Big Benn who has replaced Holder at short extra cover
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run Bailey skips back to cut this short ball from outside off to sweeper cover
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run another short one outside off, pulled with control to deep midwicket
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run Bailey steps out and gets a short ball on middle and leg. He adjusts and flicks behind square
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run roller on the pads, full in length, clipped to deep midwicket
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run offbreak leaves the left-hander outside off, short in length, and that allows Khawaja to rock back and cut to deep point
Narine to Bailey, no run flighted, hint of turn on off, flicked to midwicket
Narine to Bailey, 1 run skids off the deck, quicker and flatter on off, on the back foot is Bailey, jabbing to deep midwicket
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run shorter offbreak outside off, whipped nicely through square leg now
Narine to Bailey, 1 run flat offbreak, forced to long-on on the back foot. Easy single
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run slider on off, Khawaja punches a single to long-off and keeps strike
Benn to Khawaja, no run fuller and spins in, inside edged onto the pad
Benn to Khawaja, 1 wide slanted full down leg, wide
Benn to Khawaja, no run short and extra bounce outside off, chopped to point
Benn to Khawaja, no run similar ball, no room, chopped to point again

Benn to Khawaja, 1 leg bye very full and spins in at the leg stump, quicker one at 102.2ks, tickled to short fine leg. Given as a run by ump Illingworth. Even if that was pad first, it looked like it was nipping down leg. Benn insists on a review. Holder calls for it. It is a legal ball. Projections show it has heading down leg by some distance
Benn to Bailey, 1 run Bailey has ample time to rock back and lash this short ball outside off to sweeper cover
Benn to Khawaja, no run another fizzer on the pads, this is turned to short fine leg
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run short cutter on off, stabbed to backward point
Pollard to Khawaja, 1 run full roller on middle, nurdled to short fine leg. They push for a quick single, Bailey wanted it. Benn fumbled while loading up for the throw
Pollard to Bailey, 2 runs Bailey shuffles across the off stump and whips it away sqaure of short fine leg
Pollard to Bailey, no run dug in outside off, flat-batted away to short extra cover. Not middled
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run offcutter on middle, worked to backward square leg. Two men behind square there with Pollard dishing out these slower ones

Pollard to Khawaja, no run length on middle, Khawaja aims for a wild, big heave across the line. Nervous 90s? He's been there for a while now. The gallery shot does not come off. He top-edges it into his helmet
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run full at off, driven to long-off on the front foot
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run short and outside off, cracked away to the off-side sweeper
Brathwaite to Marsh, FOUR runs full and just outside off, induces an outside edge that beats a diving Ramdin. Good ball straightened off the surface a touch
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run full on off, whippy drive to long-off
Brathwaite to Bailey, FOUR runs short cutter outside off, Bailey waits patiently and flays a cut fine of backward point
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run banged outside off, tennis-style swing to wide long-on. Forehanded it away
Holder to Bailey, 1 run Bailey jumps outside leg, Holder digs it short on middle from over the wicket. Miscued behind square
Holder to Marsh, 1 wide full and speared down leg, wide
Holder to Marsh, FOUR runs length ball on off, smeared down the ground, beats long-on's dive to his left. Taylor lets it away for four. Din't even get the hand to it
Holder to Marsh, no run full and down leg again, why is that not a wide, Mr. Brathwaite? Marsh has a wry smile
Holder to Marsh, 1 run skiddy short ball on middle and leg, which is jabbed to midwicket
Holder to Bailey, 2 runs rising short ball outside off, Bailey has to rise with it. Slashing a cut over a leaping Narine at backward point. He stretched one hand out but could only tip it over
Holder to Bailey, 1 run length ball on middle, clubbed to deep square leg
Benn to Bailey, no run drifts in on off and rips away outside off with extra bounce, past the prodding bat. Crackin' ball. That should excite Zampa
Benn to Bailey, 1 run milked down to long-off as this was too full on the stumps
Benn to Khawaja, 1 run floated and outside off, down the track and driven to long-off
Benn to Bailey, no run short and curls in with extra bounce, fended tentatively to the leg side

Benn to Bailey, 2 runs, OUT Bailey employs the reverse sweep and sends it past lone slip. It trickles away to third man.... Taylor dishes in the chase, and fires a flat throw to the stand-in keeper. Fletcher did well to gather the ball and break the stumps. The left-hander is short on the third. Khawaja falls two short of a century. His running had been tentative
Benn to Marsh, no run drifts in full on off, dead-batted on the front foot
Narine to Bailey, 1 run Bailey aims another reverse sweep, this is hit to deep point
Narine to Marsh, no run offbreak, clips the thigh and runs fine on the leg side
Narine to Marsh, 1 run short and quick, forced down the ground
Narine to Bailey, no run offbreak, kisses the pad
Narine to Bailey, 1 run down the track, meets the pitch, and pushes to long-on
Narine to Marsh, no run offbreak, wafted to the leg side
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run Bailey skips out and nearly yorks himself. Whipped to leg
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run loopy offcutter on off, shovelled down to wide long-on
Brathwaite to Bailey, SIX runs another cutter, fuller in length on off, Bailey crouches and wades into it. Smashing it over midwicket. He hit the pants off that
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run full at speared at off, dragged to long-on
Brathwaite to Marsh, OUT low full toss on off, Marsh gives it away. The bat twisted in his hands and he ends up slicing it into the hands of Holder at mid-off
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run full and straight from round the stumps, whipped to long-on
Pollard to Bailey, no run back of a length incutter, Bailey slogs early to the leg side as the ball bounces over middle and leg stumps
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run Bailey moves outside leg, Pollard stalks him with a short ball. Pulled to deep square leg
Pollard to Head, 1 run leg-stump short ball, Head stays back and guides a single to square leg, his first run in ODIs
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run Bailey skips outside leg again, this is a short ball following him. Glanced to fine leg and Bailey raises his half-century. A busy one, that

Pollard to Head, OUT Head skies this offcutter to the keeper. Ramdin settles under it comfortably. Full and leaves the left-hander outside off. Head winds up for a roundhouse swipe. He watches the top edge lodge in the gloves of Ramdin
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run floated full and slow on off, 98ks, nudged to midwicket for one
Benn to Bailey, no run punched to short extra cover
Benn to Bailey, 1 run full and drifts in on off, Bailey leans forward and works it to the short midwicket region. A stiff-looking Benn gets to the ball
Benn to Marsh, 1 run drifts in, overpitched on off, driven smoothly to long-off
Benn to Bailey, SIX runs superb connection. First boundary since the 27th over. Down the track and lifted over long-off. Clean strike
Benn to Bailey, no run angled in and turns away viciously past the outside edge
Benn to Bailey, 1 run shorter and turns away outside off, chopped to deep cover
Narine to Bailey, 2 runs Bailey nimbly skips out to meet this full ball, which is whipped over midwicket
Narine to Bailey, 1 run short offbreak on off, the batsman hangs back and forces a single to long-on
Narine to Marsh, no run floated on off, dabbed to the cover region from the crease
Narine to Marsh, 1 run flat on middle and leg, Marsh is camping back.... might not be the best ploy. Turned to square leg
Narine to Bailey, 1 run tucked through midwicket for one
Narine to Marsh, 1 run short and turns in, on the back foot and punched to long-on. Australia have played out Narine without giving a wicket to the offspinner
Holder to Bailey, 1 run full and outside off, wider, Bailey reaches out, topples over, skewering a drive through the covers
Holder to Wade, 1 run Wade dances down the track, Holder shortens his length outside off and slogs to midwicket
Holder to Bailey, no run wide yorker, Bailey reaches out again, but can't slice it away with an angled bat
Holder to Bailey, 1 run full and outside off, Bailey slams it to long-off
Holder to Wade, FOUR runs short, possibly a slower ball outside off, it does not perturb Wade. He shifts his balance to the back foot and pulls to the midwicket boundary

Holder to Wade, OUT The middle stump is floored. Holder pumps his fist. Wade cleared his front leg and shimmied out for a drill down the ground. This yorker shatters the middle stump. No cameo from Wade. Holder caps his spell with a wicket
Pollard to Bailey, 2 runs Bailey jumps a long way outside leg and is chased by KP. Swung over square leg

Pollard to Bailey, OUT Another wicket for KP. He is pumped. Bailey jumps outside leg again. Pollard sends in an offcutter chasing the batsman. He shapes to pull and ends up top-edging it to the short midwicket region. Ramdin with the big gloves calls for the catch and completes it
Pollard to Faulkner, 2 runs Faulkner is moving outside leg as well, back of a length and into the moving batsman, slapped to wide long-off
Pollard to Faulkner, 1 run cutter outside leg following the moving batsman, worked to square leg
Pollard to Coulter-Nile, 1 run lobs a full slower ball on off, checks his drive and chips to cover
Pollard to Faulkner, 1 wide full and heads down leg, Pollard floated it wider as Faulkner backed away

Pollard to Faulkner, 1 run slower full ball on middle, pushed through midwicket for two. One short, says ump Brathwaite. Tight call, seems. Was there a tickle behind the line? I think there was some bat there

4.45pm Australia had a bright start with Khawaja and Smith making back-to-back half-centuries. Australia, however, couldn't launch from the platform in the slog overs. They lost 4 for 39 in the last five overs, despite Bailey's blows. Holder generated extra bounce upfront before Brathwaite and Pollard mixed it up with their assortment of cutters. This pitch may not have

5.12pm Welcome to the chase. Could be an interesting one of West Indies get a good start. This should be a proper test of their ability to build patiently. Out come the players. This ball will reverse swing sharply later. Hazlewood has the ball.
Hazlewood to Charles, no run nice start. Fullish and wide outside off, solidly driven to mid-off. Not much movement
Hazlewood to Charles, no run full and straight this time. Again, intentionally bowled fuller to try and invite some swing, but there is none. Driven to mid-on
Hazlewood to Charles, no run full and wide this time, gets some away movement which was responsible for the ball going over Charles' flashing blade
Hazlewood to Charles, no run ooh, full and straight. Out without a big inside edge onto pad
Hazlewood to Charles, 2 runs full on middle and leg, clipped towards fine leg. More off the inside half. A couple for Charles
Hazlewood to Charles, FOUR runs shot! Overpitched and smashed. Outside off, Charles just drills a drive past the bowler, whistles to the long-off boundary
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run beauty to start, 132 kph. A good length on off and plenty of away seam movement takes the ball past Fletcher's outside edge
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run hesitation but no run. Back of a length on off, Fletcher plays it well. Gets on top of it and plays it down towards square leg

Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, FOUR runs smashed. WI have come out with positive intent. Full and wide outside off, Fletcher backs away slightly and smashes the ball over mid-off. Did not bother keeping it down

Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, 1 run dropped. Should have been taken. Not good from Khawaja. Fullish on off, may have come back in slightly which was responsible for the ball taking the inside half of Fletcher's bat. Straight to mid-on, low but should have been taken
Coulter-Nile to Charles, FOUR runs errs in line and gets punished. Short down leg, Charles pulls and it races away to the fine leg fence. Just got some bat on it
Coulter-Nile to Charles, FOUR runs looks for the yorker, misses and gets punished again. WI on a rampage here. Strays in line, down leg and Charles calmly flicks to the square leg fence
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run nice delivery. Full and straight, a bit of inward movement. Fletcher defends

Hazlewood to Fletcher, SIX runs whoa. Not a bad delivery at all. Full on off, but Fletcher backs away, clears his front foot and mows this over midwicket. An ugly hoick but who cares? Just clears the boundary. Hmm
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run adjusts his length with a good-length delivery on off, tapped towards slip. Charles wants one, Fletcher doesn't
Hazlewood to Fletcher, FOUR runs four more. Short and wide, poor ball. Fletcher gets on top of the ball and scythes a cut through point for another boundary.
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run full down leg, another poor delivery. Fletcher misses his flick this time as the ball pings off the pad
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run good finish. Back of a length on off, Fletcher stays in his crease to defend
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run fullish on middle and leg, pushed to a deep mid-off for one. Good batting, clever
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run full on off, a solid block to cover

Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, 1 leg bye phew, that was close. Fullish on off and middle, the ball comes back and Fletcher misses a flick. That looked out to me. Maybe a bit high? Australia don't even consider a review
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 2 runs lazy drive, full and wide outside off, a bunt past cover. No feet movement at all
Coulter-Nile to Charles, SIX runs way over fine leg. Six more. What a start this is. Short on off, the ball climbs high enough to take the top edge of Charles's bat. Flies over fine leg
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run turned away to square leg off the leg side-ish line
Hazlewood to Charles, 1 run chipped into the midwicket area. Plenty of balls just lobbed in the air. Back of a length on middle and leg, Charles tries to nudge but gets a leading edge
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run another big swing. Fullish outside off, some definite inward movement. Takes the ball past Fletcher's swing. Just beats the stumps
Hazlewood to Fletcher, 1 run better from Fletcher. Back of a length on middle and leg, nudged to fine leg
Hazlewood to Charles, 3 runs another loose delivery. Short on middle, Charles rolls his wrists on that and keeps it down. Gets the ball past short fine leg for three
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run that nagging line Hazlewood is known for. Good length on off, blocked
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run good finish. Back of a length on off, defended
Faulkner to Charles, no run dropped again. Much tougher chance, hardly even carried. Just about. Full on off, a lazy drive back to the bowler. In fact, lands just short
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run fuller than a good length on middle and leg, skewed off the inside half towards square leg. Again, looking for a big hit
Faulkner to Fletcher, no run good. Full on off, nagging lines. Defended to cover
Faulkner to Fletcher, no run back of a length outside off, Fletcher tries to open the face to guide to third man but fails to execute. Chops back to the keeper
Faulkner to Fletcher, SIX runs six more. Runs coming all too easily. Quite full on off, Fletcher comes down with a lot of intent and pummels the drive straight back over the bowler. Six easy runs
Faulkner to Fletcher, no run fullish on middle, patted to point. Dot
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run full on middle and leg, very full. JC jams this one into his foot and back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run short and wide, poor delivery. Extra bounce takes the ball over the bat
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 2 runs pulled into the midwicket area. No one there so square leg has to run around to get it. In the meantime, the batsmen make two
Coulter-Nile to Charles, FOUR runs smashed for four more. Sensational batting. Overpitched on off, Charles hammers it back past the bowler. Four more
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run driven into the cover area
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run shortish on off, pulled to deep square leg for a run. Played that along the ground
Faulkner to Charles, no run full and wide outside off, Charles drives but finds extra cover

Faulkner to Charles, 2 runs Khawaja messes it up again. He is having a shocking day in the field. This was much easier than the previous one. Fullish on off, Charles backs away and heaves one to long-on. Khawaja comes forward, misjudges it and the ball goes over his head. Poor.
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run clipped to deep square leg
Faulkner to Fletcher, no run full on off, good lines. Defended
Faulkner to Fletcher, no run good length delivery on off, tapped off to third man. No run
Faulkner to Fletcher, no run another defensive stroke to end. Back of a length on off, defended towards gully
Head to Charles, 1 run tossed up, short and slow on leg. Easily worked to deep midwicket
Head to Fletcher, 1 run short and slow yet again, easily nudged to short fine leg
Head to Charles, no run flat and wide outside off, defended into the off side
Head to Charles, 1 run back of a length on off, punched to long-on. Nice batting this
Head to Fletcher, no run full and wide, hardly any turn. Goes past the outside edge
Head to Fletcher, FOUR runs slashed over point for another boundary. Tossed up but too wide, allows Fletcher to open up his arms. Over point and that will be four more
Faulkner to Charles, no run back of a length outside off, tapped to point
Faulkner to Charles, no run good length on middle, blocked by Charles
Faulkner to Charles, FOUR runs poor delivery. Four more. Shorter delivery on leg stump, an easy offering for Charles who flicks past short fine leg
Faulkner to Charles, 1 leg bye drifts down leg, slower ball. Off the pad to fine leg for one

Faulkner to Fletcher, OUT gone this time. The slower delivery and Australia have their first. A slow, good-length delivery outside off, the ball stops on Fletcher who checks his stroke. Since he withdraws very late, the ball bobs up off the withdrawing bat and is easily taken by point. Will that spark something?
Faulkner to Bravo, no run full and wide outside off, left alone by Bravo
Marsh to Charles, no run seam-up outside off, the ball bounces extra and over the bat of Charles who wanted to dab one to third man
Marsh to Charles, 1 run short and wide, another poor delivery. Cut away to deep point with lots of ease
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run shortish and wide, Bravo opens the bat face to guide to third man
Marsh to Charles, no run good length and straight, shovelled to midwicket
Marsh to Charles, 1 run punched to long-on
Marsh to Bravo, no run full and straight on off, Bravo defends from the crease
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run fullish on off, punched to deep cover
Faulkner to Bravo, FOUR runs nicely played. Full and wide outside off, Bravo leans on the drive and times it beautifully. The ball races away through cover for four. just timing
Faulkner to Bravo, no run driven to cover this time
Faulkner to Bravo, no run fullish down leg, drifting down. Worked to square leg, Zampa puts in a dive
Faulkner to Bravo, no run full on off, a thick inside edge onto the pad. Looked to go over the infield on that occasion
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 run drifts down leg, and Bravo works this off his hips to square leg for a single
Marsh to Bravo, no run good length on off, Bravo stands tall to defend under his eyes
Marsh to Bravo, no run shortish and wide, Bravo looks to rasp a cut but misses. Cross seam, takes the ball over the bat, extra bounce
Marsh to Bravo, no run back of a length outside off, played down to point
Marsh to Bravo, no run short and wide, stops in the surface and Bravo is through his slap. Patted back
Marsh to Bravo, no run back of a length outside off, punched into the off side
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run short of a length outside off, pushed to deep cover
Zampa to Bravo, no run some flight on off, but no turn. Bravo comes down to defend
Zampa to Bravo, no run
Zampa to Bravo, 1 run more flight on leg, punched to long-on, good use of the wrists to find the gap
Zampa to Samuels, no run more flight outside off, Samuels strides forward to defend
Zampa to Samuels, 1 run shortish and wide-ish, punched into the cover region
Marsh to Samuels, no run shortish on off, Samuels defends under his eyes
Marsh to Samuels, no run full on off, pushed back to the bowler
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run steered to third man off the back foot
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run drifts down leg side and Bravo works one to fine leg to get one
Marsh to Samuels, no run full and wide outside off, Samuels leaves comfortably
Marsh to Samuels, no run 127 kph, full and wide delivery to finish. Too wide to draw a stroke and Samuels chooses to leave
Zampa to Bravo, FOUR runs too much flight and pummeled. Tossed up but too full, Bravo clobbers a straight drive past his partner and he gets four
Zampa to Bravo, no run slightly leg side-ish this time, Bravo was shaping to sweep but bailed out late. Flicks to square leg
Zampa to Bravo, SIX runs too much flight again and smashed. Bravo leans on the drive and muscles it over long-on, didn't bother keeping that down. Clears the boundary easily
Zampa to Bravo, 1 run pats one towards point to get one
Zampa to Samuels, no run flight on middle and leg, Samuels comes forward to defend
Zampa to Samuels, no run defended again, flatter this time on leg, played away towards midwicket

Coulter-Nile to Bravo, FOUR runs crisply driven for four. Overpitched outside off and Bravo leans on the drive, gets it past cover. Marsh runs across but parries it onto his other hand while in contact with the boundary so that will be four more
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run shortish and wide outside off, Bravo hangs back and taps to point
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, 1 wide overly full, overly wide. Left alone and a wide is called.
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run back of a length outside off, the ball moves away late and the ball beats the bat. Bravo may have played inside the line of that
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run full and wide outside off, Bravo lets this one go
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run full and wide outside off, Bravo doesn't bother with this as he lets it go
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run another leave from a wide delivery outside off
Marsh to Samuels, no run length and angled in from over the wicket, Samuels camps back and defends it to short extra cover
Marsh to Samuels, no run shortish and outside off, Samuels plays with soft hands, dabbing to backward point
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run pretty full and outside off, Samuels leans forward and caresses a single to sweeper cover. Driven neatly
Marsh to Bravo, no run full and angled into the left-hander from round the stumps, Bravo keeps back and drops it defensively in front of his feet
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run too full and outside off, Bravo has a leaden-footed flash and sends an outside edge flying... does not carry to Khawaja at third man
Marsh to Samuels, no run back of a length on off, Samuels blocks it to short midwicket to finish the over
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, 1 run full and aimed at off, Bravo glides a single to third man
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, no run Samuels leans back and jabs this short ball from outside off to backward point. Jabbing punch straight to the fielder
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, no run full and on the stumps, slapped fiercely to short extra cover, it bounces and bursts through the hands of Bailey at short extra cover. Mid-off has it covered
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, no run back of a length and tucks up the right hander for room. Played towards point
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, 1 run the bowler goes wide of the crease and angles this full ball in on middle, nudged to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, 1 run full and straight, Bravo hangs back and picks it away through square leg
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run back of a length and outside off, punched out to sweeper cover
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Samuels stands tall as he eases it to sweeper cover
Marsh to Bravo, no run full and aimed at off, open-faced dab to point
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run full and outside off, steered down to third man for one
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run full and might have been a cutter, Samuels yanks his bottom hand off the bat. Loosening the grip and nurdling a single towards square leg
Marsh to Bravo, no run worked off the pads to short midwicket
Head to Samuels, 2 runs sliding across off from round the stumps, slapped past diving short extra cover for a couple. The fielder dived to his left and took some pace off the ball
Head to Samuels, no run full and Head finds a bit of turn to beat the straight-bat push and rap the pad
Head to Samuels, 1 run jabbed to mid-off for one. Samuels is home, despite a direct hit from Finch
Head to Bravo, no run Head lands this just outside off, grips and turns past the prodding bat
Head to Bravo, no run drifts in full on off, Bravo thrusts his bat in front of the pad and blocks towards cover
Head to Bravo, no run turn and dip! Bravo aims for a leg-side flick and drops a leading edge in front of midwicket. Probing over
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run full and on middle, Samuels nudges it in front of short extra cover and sets off for a quick single
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run length ball angled in on off, Bravo opens the face and steers it past backward point to third man
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run leg-stump half-volley, flicked to long leg
Marsh to Bravo, 1 run too full on middle, driven down to long-off
Marsh to Samuels, SIX runs heave-ho! Length ball on off, slower at 110.7ks, Samuels plants his front leg forward, waits, and launches it over long-on for his 100th ODI six
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run chopped from the stumps to third man
Head to Samuels, 1 run blockhole ball on off, squeezed to sweeper cover
Head to Bravo, no run full and straightens on middle and leg, blocked
Head to Bravo, no run flat and quick on middle, bunted to the covers
Head to Bravo, 1 run floater on middle, milked down to long-off with a straight bat
Head to Samuels, no run Head twirls it full on off even as the batsman steps out. Driven to mid-off
Head to Samuels, no run back of a length and breaks in to ping the thigh. Samuels was surprised by the turn as well as bounce. He was left beaten
Hazlewood to Bravo, 1 run full at the legs from over the wicket, knocked to the midwicket region
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run short and zings outside off, the extra bounce foils the attempted slash. Bounces past the top edge
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run Samuels suceeds in slashing a single to sweeper cover as this was short and offered width
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run length ball on middle, helped to short third man off the face
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run full and drifting down leg, may have brushed the pad on its way to Wade. There was no deflection, there. Plenty of debatable umpiring calls this series
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run full on middle, invites the drive, hit to left of mid-off
Head to Samuels, no run full on middle, blocked
Head to Samuels, no run offbreak, Samuels jumps out, swings and squirts an inside edge onto the pad
Head to Samuels, no run skips out to a offbreak, inside edge does not carry to short leg
Head to Samuels, no run overpitched on middle, drilled to short extra cover
Head to Samuels, 1 run breaking down leg, diverted fine on the leg side
Head to Bravo, 2 runs dragged short and turns away outside off, slashes a cut through backward point on the back foot
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run short on off, leans back and chops past backward point
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run short and outside off, cuts and misses. No feet movement there
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run full on middle, pushes with an angled bat to the covers
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run full and nips away off the deck. Beats the angled bat outside off to the keeper
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run Hazlewood pulls his length back on middle and pushes Bravo further back. He drops it in front of his feet
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run full and swerves away outside off, Bravo is desperate to run down to third man with an angled bat. Beaten again
Head to Samuels, no run spinning into middle and leg, blocked to short leg
Head to Samuels, FOUR runs Samuels skips out and aims to put the bowler off. He manufactures a half-volley and drills a drive past the covers. Nimble footwork
Head to Samuels, 1 run Samuels dances out again, this one spins and takes the pad. He wasn't quite close to the pitch of that ball
Head to Bravo, 1 run tucked off the pads to short fine leg, the fielder fumbles and paves the way for an easy single
Head to Samuels, 2 runs full and outside off, big stride forward as Samuels carves a drive behind point

Head to Samuels, no run Samuels steps out and nearly pops a return catch. Offbreak, grips in the surface. Samuels is not close to the pitch again, checks his shot, and lobs it.... Head dives but the ball dips agonosingly in front of him
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run back of a length on middle, run away to backward point
Hazlewood to Bravo, 1 run full on middle, angled towards backward point for one, played it to the left of the fielder
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run short and angled in on middle, blocked quietly off the back foot
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run overpitched on middle, (reverse)swings in, clears his front leg, and drags to mid-on
Hazlewood to Samuels, FOUR runs overpitched on middle, Samuels replies with a regal drive. Gets the front foot out of the way and belts it to the left of diving mid-off
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run backs away to meet a short ball, thwacks it to sweeper cover
Head to Samuels, no run slider on middle, backs away, and cuts straight to short extra cover
Head to Samuels, 1 wide pitched outside leg and breaks away further. drifting down leg, wide called by ump Brathwaite
Head to Samuels, FOUR runs Samuels skips out, collapses his back leg and goes inside out in the air, between extra cover and mid-off. Lofted the offbreak with authority
Head to Samuels, no run straighter one, defended with bat and pad close together
Head to Samuels, no run turn and bounce! Samuels goes back and gets an inside edge that does not carry to short leg
Head to Samuels, no run dangled up on middle, Samuels inches forward and defends
Head to Samuels, 1 run tucks this flat ball off the hips to fine leg
Faulkner to Samuels, FOUR runs Samuels greets Faulkner with a smeared four! Short on off, fraction short, rocks back and pummels to the wide long-on fence
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 run Faulkner drags his length back on off, Samuels cuts a single to sweeper cover. Faulkner collapses in his followthrough. He's fine
Faulkner to Bravo, no run overpitched and outside off, forward and creamed to short extra cover
Faulkner to Bravo, no run Faulkner rollls his fingers across this legcutter outside off, kicks up from the back of the hand and beats Bravo
Faulkner to Bravo, no run another back of the hand legbreak, Bravo swings early and misses
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 run full cutter on off, 110ks, Bravo waited and eased through the covers
Zampa to Bravo, 1 run flighted legbreak, glanced off the pad behind square

Zampa to Samuels, FOUR runs another perfectly pitched legbreak leaves Samuels outside off, he plays back after having ventured forward and edges a cut... It rolls between slip and Smith, stretching his left hand out at lone slip
Zampa to Samuels, no run flatter legbreak outside off, guided to short third man
Zampa to Samuels, 1 run short and quick on off, backs away and punches to sweeper cover
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run darted short on middle, swat-pulled to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run short on off, defended towards point. Ramdin looks for one but is sent back
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run Faulker goes wide of the crease and cuts it in at 116ks from round the stumps, flicked to midwicket
Faulkner to Ramdin, no run full and on off, pushed back to the bowler
Faulkner to Ramdin, 1 run little cutter outside off, sliced to deep point
Faulkner to Samuels, FOUR runs full and outside off, offcutter, Samuels glides it fine of short third man for four and his fifty
Faulkner to Samuels, 1 leg bye back of the hand legbreak, swerves in and catches the thigh pad. Rolls to the leg side. Faulkner found extra bounce, again
Zampa to Samuels, no run loopy legbreak outside off, slapped to short extra cover
Zampa to Samuels, 1 run shorter legbreak, played off the back foot to backward point. Faulkner throws and Zampa misses, giving a single
Zampa to Ramdin, no run lobbed up slower and outside off, sharp legbreak, left alone
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run chopped from off stump through point
Zampa to Samuels, FOUR runs quicker legbreak outside off, Samuels plays it late. Dabs a cut to third man, beating backward point to his left. Top shot
Zampa to Samuels, no run tapped to midwicket off the back foot
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 run full and cuts in on off, Ramdin seeks to drive and gets an inside edge to the leg side
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, no run back of a length and swings in, bounces over the stumps as Samuels swipes and does not connect. Reverse for NCN?
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, no run short on top of off, Samuels gets on top of the bounce and cuts to backward point
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, no run another rising short ball, he can't get on top. Chopped to the same fielder
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, FOUR runs width and Samuels lays into it. He waited for the bad ball. Short and outside off, crunched a cut to the right of backward point. This is a fine knock from Samuels
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, no run NCN responds with a 102ks slower bouncer, Samuels half-sways and half-ducks out of the way
Zampa to Ramdin, SIX runs flight and deposited over the long-on boundary. Just a hint of air on off, Ramdin backs away by clearing his front foot, opens up the field and slog-sweeps over long-on
Zampa to Ramdin, no run slightly short and wide, Ramdin gets on top of the bounce and slaps to cover
Zampa to Ramdin, 2 runs goes over mid-on again, against the turn. Flight on off and middle, Ramdin offers more of a straight bat face this time, just a couple
Zampa to Ramdin, no run tossed up on off, pushed to cover
Zampa to Ramdin, no run more flight on middle and leg, Ramdin defends
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run flat and wide outside off, thrashed to deep point
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 run some inswing on off. Ramdin looked to drive through cover but it squirts off the inside half to square leg
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, 1 run poor shot but he gets away with it. Clears his front leg, tries to go over mid-off but the ball skews off the outside half and lands in front of sweeper cover
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 run shortish and wide, glided to third man for one
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, 1 run slapped to deep cover off the back foot
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 5 wide loads of extra runs. Inward movement but this one starts too straight and goes further down leg. Bounces in front of Wade and goes away for five.
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, no run full and wide outside off, miscued to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, no run full and straight, jags back in but not as much as it was in the previous game. Blocked solidly to mid-on
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run full, wide and hammered. Samuels clears his front foot again and thrashes a cover drive. Sweeper cover scurries across to field
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run back of a length on middle and leg, Ramdin smothers the ball into his pad flap. Picks up the ball and gives it to the bowler
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run good length on off, chopped to point
Hazlewood to Ramdin, 1 run tails back in from outside off, steered to third man. That shot should be put away with this movement

Hazlewood to Samuels, no run short and wide, Samuels backs away and looks to scythe it away but misses. Or did he? Smith wants to review. He has missed it by a substantial distance. Was a hardly audible sound, which probably prompted Smith's call. But all's well for Samuels because there is no bat
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run shortish length on off, Samuels laces his cut but finds backward point this time
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, no run full on middle and leg, tails back in and strikes Ramdin in front. Sliding down leg though
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 wide this one has started too straight and gone down leg
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 2 runs slides down leg again, worked off his pads to wide fine leg for a brace. NCN has got to start this wider outside off
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 run slow, short one outside off is dabbed to third man to get one
Coulter-Nile to Samuels, 1 run full toss on off, looking for that yorker but misses. Slashed to deep point. Samuels' pads are almost never in line to the seamers
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 run good length on off, tapped to point for a run, 135 kph

Coulter-Nile to Samuels, 1 run back of a length down leg, nurdled to short fine leg for a run. The throw ricochets off Ramdin's pads to the sweeper cover and the crowd go up in raucous amazement that the batsmen aren't considering the overthrow
Hazlewood to Samuels, no run it's working though. A leg-stump guard, his pads are well down leg. Hazlweood's inwinger hits Samuels but down leg

Hazlewood to Samuels, no run full and straight, Samuels chops one back to the bowler. Interesting that Samuels is persistently looking to hit through the off side. With this angle, the leg side seems a higher percentage option
Hazlewood to Samuels, 2 runs ooh, just wide of midwicket. Full and tailing back in towards off and middle, Samuels tries to go over cover but skews to wide long-on
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run looks to go straighter this time but that angle helps a squirt off the inside half to long-on
Hazlewood to Ramdin, 1 run drifting down leg. Better option from Ramdin as he clips to deep square leg
Hazlewood to Samuels, 1 run smeared to midwicket for one. Samuels trying to do too much
Marsh to Samuels, no run short and wide, Samuels tries to go through point but the ball skews back to the bowler. Has lost all his shape and timing
Marsh to Samuels, 2 runs again. Shortish delivery on middle, Samuels tries to go through the off side but inside-edges to fine leg. Two a result
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run slow legcutter outside off, so wide that it would have been called ad Samuels let it go but he reaches out for it to slap to sweeper
Marsh to Ramdin, no run full and straight, pushed to midwicket
Marsh to Ramdin, 2 runs drifting down leg, whipped towards backward square leg where Khawaja gets around from fine leg to save the boundary with a dive
Marsh to Ramdin, no run full and straight to finish, worked to midwicket

Zampa to Samuels, SIX runs six. Very risky stroke and he gets away with it. Flight on off, Samuels comes down and miscues his lofted drive off the outside half. It hangs in the air for a while., Head at long-off backtracks and takes the catch but is falling over. He tries to push it back as he falls over but pushes it over the boundary instead
Zampa to Samuels, SIX runs six more. More flight on off, Samuels runs down and lofts it with the spin, Though he could clear long-ff and he did easily
Zampa to Samuels, SIX runs make that three in a row. More flight outside off, Samuels steps out and hits it in the same area. Clears long-off again, awesome hitting

Zampa to Samuels, OUT and he's gone. What is happening? Zampa bowls this flat and quick down leg, Samuels goes back and allows the ball to hit his pad and he goes through for a leg bye. Wade runs across to short square leg, picks up, turns around and throws the stumps down while moving, at the bowler's end. Wow, what an effort from Wadey.
Zampa to Ramdin, no run flat on leg, Ramdin is struck on the pad and there is a massive appeal. Pad before bat, struck him in front of leg but where did that pitch?
Zampa to Ramdin, no run flat on off, Ramdin defends
Marsh to Pollard, no run yorker on off, Pollard steps out and pushes to mid-on
Marsh to Pollard, no run full on off, Pollard shimmies down again, trying to get ahead of the swing. Drives back to the bowler who throws back but misses
Marsh to Pollard, no run back of a length on off, Pollard gets on top of the bounce and defends
Marsh to Pollard, no run shortish delivery on off, inside-edged onto his huge frame
Marsh to Pollard, 1 run shortish outside off, drag-pulled to deep square leg
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run overpitched on off, smeared to fine leg
Zampa to Ramdin, no run flight outside off, good length. Ramdin leaves
Zampa to Ramdin, no run more flight on off, driven back to the bowler
Zampa to Ramdin, no run shorter length on middle, shovelled to midwicket
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run shortish and wide, slashed to deep point
Zampa to Pollard, no run flat on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket

Zampa to Pollard, SIX runs phew. That is ridiculous. Unbelievable. Nonsense. What? Tossed up outside off, Pollard tried to go over long-on by dragging it but got more of a leading edge which flies over cover. And went a fair way back too. A 90 degree change in shot direction, still enough muscle behind it.
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 wide strays down leg for a wide
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, FOUR runs whipped past square leg this time and there is no deep fielder so WI inch closer. Looking for that inswinger but too straight again
Coulter-Nile to Holder, no run full on off, good line that. Driven to cover

Coulter-Nile to Holder, OUT gone. Holder is given. But he opts for the review. Good length delivery outside off, which jags back in again. Holder attempts a big swing and the ball goes through between bat and pad. Looks like he has missed it, but there is a sound. Not sure what it is. Swerves back in and Wade collects well, diving to his left. Not enough evidence
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, no run yorker on off, blocked
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, no run honing in on that off stump but Brathwaite's bat intervenes. Much better over from NCN
Hazlewood to Pollard, 1 run back of a length on middle, Pollard shimmies and works to square leg
Hazlewood to Brathwaite, no run good length on off, tapped to point
Hazlewood to Brathwaite, no run fullish on off, steered to point
Hazlewood to Brathwaite, 1 run opens the bat face to get this one tho third man
Hazlewood to Pollard, FOUR runs shortish and wide, Pollard tries to get on top of the bounce but cannot. Goes through with his cut and gets it past point, races away
Hazlewood to Pollard, 3 runs smashed over midwicket for three. Ran down to the pitch and flicked it away to bring WI closer
Coulter-Nile to Pollard, no run short and wide, Pollard has a loose waft but misses
Coulter-Nile to Pollard, 1 run full and wide outside off, Pollard tries to clear midwicket again but toe-ends to third man
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, no run shortish on off, defended by his feet
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, 2 runs that is it. Short and wide, steered past point as WI post a four-wicket win to beat Australia
Time for the presentation.

8.38pm The music is blaring, the crowd is singing, WI players shake hands with each other and joy abounds Basseterre because West Indies have done exceptionally well in their chase to thrash Australia on a tricky surface. Chasing 266, West Indies' openers gave them a lightning start to set up the chase. Significant contributions through the middle order, led by Samuels'
West Indies won by 4 wickets (with 26 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Marlon Samuels, WI
